Ping.name: ping
Ping.description: Checks the bot’s current response time and verifies that it is online and responding correctly. Useful for diagnosing latency or connection issues.

BotInfo.name: botinfo
BotInfo.description: Displays detailed information about the bot, including uptime, latency, server and member count, main features, and developer details.

ServerInfo.name: serverinfo
ServerInfo.description: Shows key information about the current server such as owner, member count, creation date, verification level, roles, channels, boosts, and more.

UserInfo.name: userinfo
UserInfo.description: Provides detailed information about a selected user, including account creation date, server join date, roles, status, and highest role.

Invite.name: invite
Invite.description: Generates an official invite link that allows you to add the bot to other servers with the required permissions.

Purge.name: purge
Purge.description: Quickly removes multiple recent messages from the current channel for moderation and cleanup purposes.

Mock.name: mock
Mock.description: Converts the provided text into alternating upper- and lower-case letters, creating a sarcastic or mocking style of text.

Reverse.name: reverse
Reverse.description: Reverses the order of characters in the provided text.

Emojify.name: emojify
Emojify.description: Converts each letter and number in the provided text into its corresponding emoji representation.
Emojify.restriction: Result must fit within Discord’s message length limits

Rate.name: rate
Rate.description: Randomly rates a word, phrase, or object on a scale of 1 to 10. The same input will always receive the same rating.

Choose.name: choose
Choose.description: Randomly selects one option from a list of user-provided choices.
Choose.restriction: At least 2 choices required, maximum of 5

Ship.name: ship
Ship.description: Calculates a fun compatibility percentage between two users based on several factors such as account age, join time, and shared roles.
Ship.restriction: Users must be members of the server

Compliment.name: compliment
Compliment.description: Sends a random, positive compliment to the selected user. Compliments rotate to avoid repetition.

Insult.name: insult
Insult.description: Sends a light-hearted, non-offensive insult to the selected user. Insults rotate to avoid repetition.

Avatar.name: avatar
Avatar.description: Sends user profile photo, optionally different image filters/effect can be applied.

CoinFlip.name: coinfliip
CoinFlip.description: Flips a coin to get Heads or Tails.
